alert.note: Alert for Eastern Magic Valley; Lower Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued January 12 at 4:23AM MST until January 13 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST SATURDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM SATURDAY TO 11 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Blizzard Warning, blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. For the Winter Storm Warning, moderate to heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Lower Snake River Plain and Eastern Magic Valley, including but not limited to Pocatello, Blackfoot, American Falls, Shelley, Fort Hall, Burley, Rupert, Heyburn, and Oakley. * WHEN...For the Blizzard Warning, until 5 AM MST Saturday. For the Winter Storm Warning, from 5 AM Saturday to 11 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing and drifting snow will significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning and evening commute.
info.instruction: For the Blizzard Warning, travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. For the Winter Storm Warning, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by visiting 511.idaho.gov.
